text: Welcome to our Channel please do not forget to subscribe to our E online verse Channel hey everyone welcome back to my E online verse Channel my name is sham raal today we will explore the transformative impact of biotechnology and agriculture this Dynamic field integrates biology and Technology to address critical challenges like food security environmental sustainability and climate resilience before we move forward we need to understand what biotechnology is in agriculture at its core biotechnology and agriculture involves using scientific techniques such as genetic engineering molecular biology and tissue culture to improve plants animals and microorganisms for farming unlike traditional breeding which can take years biotechnology allows us to make precise changes at the genetic level to enhance specific traits it is also important to understand why biotechnology and agriculture is important the demand for food is rising as the global population approaches 10 billion by 2050 at the same time farmers face challenges like climate change pests and limited natural resources biotechnology offers innovative solutions such as higher crop yields through pest or drought resistant plants improved nutritional content such as biofortified rice with added vitamin A sustainable practice like reducing the need for harmful pesticides or excessive water use in this video I will highlight biotechnology and agriculture Which shapes Industries and Society across the globe as part of over 10 series episodes in this sixth episode I shall dive deep into biotechnology and agriculture how it works technological Trends challenges and opportunities ahead whether you are a beginner Enthusiast professional or just someone curious to learn more this series is designed to make you aware of biotechnology and agriculture worldwide let's get started on this journey together without further delay let us dive into biotechnology and Agriculture and its impactful developments in the next 15 minutes I will cover what biotechnology and agriculture entails key technological Trends driving Innovation challenges and opportunities shaping the future of this field the first topic of our agenda is what is biotechnology and agriculture biotechnology and agriculture involves using scientific techniques to modify plants animals and microorganisms to improve productivity enhance resistance to diseases and ensure sustainability key techniques in agricultural biotechnology genetic engineering altering the DNA of crops for traits like pest resistance or drought tolerance example BT cotton tissue culture growing plant cells and controlled environments to produce disease-free plants molecular markers identifying genes associated with desirable traits for selective breeding synthetic biology designing new biological parts or systems to address agricultural challenges the second topic of our agenda is key technological Trends and biotechnology for agriculture first Gene editing with crisp cast 9 what is crisp arcast 9 a precise Gene editing tool that enables scientists to modify specific genes in Plants applications in agriculture pest resistance crops with built-in resistance to Insects reducing pesticide use drought and climate resilience modifying crops like rice and wheat to tolerate water scarcity or extreme temperatures enhanced nutrition developing biofortified crops like golden rice enriched with vitamin A gen gentically modified organisms GMOs crops like BT cotton and herbicide resistant soybeans are engineered for better productivity and lower environmental impact biopesticides and biofertilizers harnessing microorganisms to naturally protect plants and enrich the soil examples crisp are edited tomatoes with extended shelf life Gene edited wheat resistant to fungal diseases second biopesticides and biofertilizers what are biopesticides and biofertilizers biopesticides use natural organisms or substances to control pests while biofertilizers enhance soil fertility using beneficial microbes Trends microbial Solutions companies are developing microbial inoculant that promote plant growth and protect crops from pathogens Precision application combining biotechnology with iot for targeted delivery of biopesticides and biofertilizers benefits reduced chemical usage improved soil health and minimized environmental impact examples basilis thuringensis BT based biopesticides for Pest Control micor risal fungi based biofertilizer to enhance nutrient uptake third genomics and big data and agriculture genomics for crop Improvement advances in DNA sequencing allow scientists to decode plant genomes identifying genes responsible for yield disease resistance and climate adaptation role of Big Data genomic data combined with AI and machine learning helps predict optimal traits for breeding programs enables Precision agriculture by analyzing weather soil and crop data for informed decisions Example The genome sequencing of wheat has led to the development of higher yielding disease resistant varieties for fourth synthetic biology and bio-engineered solutions synthetic biology and agriculture engineering biological systems to create entirely innovative solutions such as nitrogen fixing crops or bio-engineered plant-based meat Alternatives Trends development of crops that produce their fertilizer by fixing nitrogen from the air bioengineered algae for sustainable biofuels and animal feed examples synthetic rice for ities with enhanced yields and nutritional content algae based animal feed to reduce methane emissions in livestock fifth ARA interference technology what is Rai a natural biological process where RNA molecules inhibit gene expression effectively silencing specific genes applications in agriculture Pest Control through RNA based sprays that Target pests without harming beneficial insects disease resistance by silencing genes that pathogens use to infect plants example RI based sprays protect crops like potatoes and corn from viral and fungal diseases the second topic of our agenda is challenges and opportunities first let me share the challenges in biotechnology and agriculture challenges regulatory hurdles stringent regulations for genetically modified organisms GMOs can delay the adoption of Biotech crops public perception concerns about food safety and environmental impact often lead to resistance Against Biotech Innovations accessibility and Equity prohibitive costs of biotechnology May exclude small holder farmers in developing regions environmental concerns overreliance on certain biotech Solutions such as the monoculture of GM crops can lead to biodiversity loss biotechnology often raises questions about safety and ethics however rigorous testing and Regulatory Frameworks ensure that biotech products are safe for humans animals and the environment education and transparent communication play a key role in addressing public concerns despite so many challenges there are still a lot of opportunities in biotechnology and agriculture sustainable agriculture biotechnology reduces the need for harmful chemicals promoting environmentally friendly farming practices food secur biotech crops with higher yields and resilience to climate change can address Global hunger climate change mitigation engineered plants can capture more carbon dioxide or produce renewable biofuels reducing greenhouse gas emissions personalized agriculture using Ai and biotech tools farmers can cultivate crops tailored to specific soil conditions climates and consumer preferences the future of agricultural biotechnology is exciting emerging Innovations like Gene drives to control pests or synthetic biology to create entirely new biological systems could revolutionize farming these tools will be essential in building a resilient sustainable and secure Global Food system before I conclude this topic my final thoughts biotechnology and agriculture is at the Forefront of innovation addressing critical challenges like food security climate change and sustainability trends like crisper synthetic biology and biopesticides are reshaping the future of farming the fusion of biotechnology and agriculture is not just about growing more food it is about growing smarter healthier and more sustainable food for a growing global population in summary biotechnology and agriculture combines science and Innovation to tackle pressing Global challenges it holds the potential to not only secure our food supply but also create a more sustainable and Equitable future for all I would be happy to answer any questions or discuss the exciting future of biotechnology and agriculture that might impact your field of Interest please leave comments in the comment section thank you for your attention please stay tuned for my seventh episode on autonomous vehicles which I promise will be exciting and insightful I am sure you do not want to miss it if you like this video please hit that subscribe button and join the E online verse family today and don't forget to click the notification Bell so you'll always be the first to know when we drop something new your support means the world to us and it helps us create even better content for you let's grow and Thrive together in the E online verse Channel thank you for watching and we'll see you in the next video
